data.title: Matching Gifts
data.text:
What are matching gift programs?

Matching gift programs are corporate giving programs in which the company matches donations made by employees to nonprofit organizations like St. Cecilia.

What are volunteer grant programs?

Volunteer grant programs are corporate giving programs in which companies provide monetary donations to nonprofit organizations where employees volunteer. When you volunteer at St. Cecilia, you can provide us with an additional financial contribution.

How do I request a matching gift or volunteer grant?

Requesting a matching gift or volunteer grant is an easy process which must be initiated by the donor or volunteer. You can do this by filling out and submitting a match form provided by your employer.

This is a list from the Archdiocese and it may not include all companies as there is no way to know who does and does not offer these types of programs. If your company is eligible, request a matching gift form from your employer and send the completed form to St. Cecilia.
